title: Belarusan (1973) Genesis Portion (Greatlitvan)
description: Belarusian translation of the first four chapters of Genesis published in 1973 by Francis Skoryna Greatlivan for the Society of Arts and Sciences in the U.S. Belarusian is the primary language spoken in Belarus.
provider: Francis Skoryna Greatlitvan (Bielarus) Society of Arts and Sciences in the U.S., Inc.

language.name: Belarusian
language.area: Also in Azerbaijan, Canada, Estonia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Latvia, Lithuania, Moldova, Poland, Russian Federation (Europe), Tajikistan, Turkmenistan, Ukraine, United States, Uzbekistan.
